options.content:
- **Use Cases**: This dashboard shows code coverage metrics from Codecov organized by flags.
- **Data Source Required**: Codecov
- **Metrics**: Overall Coverage, Modified Coverage, Methods Coverage, and Coverage Trends per flag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.coverage_percentage FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    (SELECT cc.overall_coverage FROM _tool_codecov_commit_coverages cc INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON cc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND cc.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND cc.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND cc.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY cc.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1)
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.lines_total FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.lines_total > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.hits FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.hits > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.misses FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.misses > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

panels.description: Overall coverage trend over time for selected flag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.commit_timestamp) as time_sec,
  c.coverage_percentage as value
FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND c.coverage_percentage > 0
  AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp

panels.title: Overall Coverage Trend

panels.description: Average patch coverage over selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(comp.patch), 2), 0) as value
FROM _tool_codecov_comparisons comp
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON comp.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
INNER JOIN _tool_codecov_commits cm ON comp.connection_id = cm.connection_id AND comp.repo_id = cm.repo_id AND comp.commit_sha = cm.commit_sha
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND comp.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND comp.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND comp.patch IS NOT NULL
  AND cm.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND cm.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.commit_timestamp) as time_sec,
  c.lines_covered as 'Lines Covered',
  c.lines_total as 'Lines Total'
FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND c.lines_total > 0
  AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp

targets.rawSql:
WITH date_series AS (
  SELECT DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL seq.seq DAY) as date_val,
         UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL seq.seq DAY)) as time_sec
  FROM (
    SELECT @row := @row + 1 as seq
    FROM (SELECT 0 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t1,
         (SELECT 0 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t2,
         (SELECT 0 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t3,
         (SELECT @row := -1) r
  ) seq
  WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE($__timeFrom()), INTERVAL seq.seq DAY) <= DATE($__timeTo())
),
daily_data AS (
  SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(cm.commit_timestamp)) as time_sec,
    AVG(comp.patch) as daily_avg
  FROM _tool_codecov_comparisons comp
  INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON comp.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
  INNER JOIN _tool_codecov_commits cm ON comp.connection_id = cm.connection_id AND comp.repo_id = cm.repo_id AND comp.commit_sha = cm.commit_sha
  WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
    AND comp.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
    AND comp.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
    AND comp.patch IS NOT NULL
    AND cm.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND cm.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY DATE(cm.commit_timestamp), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(cm.commit_timestamp))
),
joined_data AS (
  SELECT
    ds.time_sec,
    dd.daily_avg
  FROM date_series ds
  LEFT JOIN daily_data dd ON ds.time_sec = dd.time_sec
),
with_running_avg AS (
  SELECT
    time_sec,
    daily_avg,
    AVG(daily_avg) OVER (ORDER BY time_sec ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as running_avg
  FROM joined_data
)
SELECT
  time_sec,
  ROUND(COALESCE(
    running_avg,
    (SELECT running_avg FROM with_running_avg w2 WHERE w2.running_avg IS NOT NULL AND w2.time_sec <= with_running_avg.time_sec ORDER BY w2.time_sec DESC LIMIT 1)
  ), 2) as value
FROM with_running_avg
ORDER BY time_sec
